Klasse Pathfinder

java.lang.Object
model.game.AI.Pathfinder
public class Pathfinder extends Object
The Pathfinder class computes the optimal path for the AI by simulating card sequences. It evaluates moves, distances, and fields to decide the best course toward a checkpoint.

  • Methodendetails

    • bruteForceBestSequence

      public List<String> bruteForceBestSequence(Position start, List<String> cardsInHand, int cleverness)
      Returns ONE list of 5-card sequences (limited by cleverness) that maximize the score to reach the next checkpoint.
      Parameter:
      start - the starting position
      cardsInHand - the list of available cards in hand
      cleverness - the AIs cleverness level; higher means more permutations are considered
      Gibt zurück:
      the best found card sequence

    • adjustDistanceForCheckpoint

      public int adjustDistanceForCheckpoint(int distance, int checkPointIndex)
      Adjusts the distance score by checkpoint priority. By heavily increasing scores for higher checkpoints, robots are motivated to reach checkpoints as quickly as possible.
      Parameter:
      distance - The distance to the goal.
      checkPointIndex - The index of the current checkpoint.
      Gibt zurück:
      A score reflecting proximity to checkpoint, prioritizing higher checkpoints.

    • moveToNextCheckpoint

      public void moveToNextCheckpoint()
      Increments the current checkpoint index if there are more checkpoints.

    • getCurrentCheckpointIndex

      public int getCurrentCheckpointIndex()

    • initializeBoard

      public void initializeBoard(String boardName)
      Loads a board from a JSON file and initializes it.
      Parameter:
      boardName - the board file name (without ".json")

    • findBestDirectionToGoal

      public Direction findBestDirectionToGoal(Position currentPosition, Position targetPosition)
      Helps the AI to select a suitable direction after rebooting. For this, distances for x and y are calculated and a MoveI card is simulated to ensure the robot is not facing a wall.
      Parameter:
      currentPosition - The current position of the robot.
      targetPosition - The position of the next target tile.
      Gibt zurück:
      The best direction to choose when rebooting.

    • initializeLogger
